db:abstract.db:para: A QML application that demonstrates how to render a scene in Qt 3D.

db:article.db:programlisting:
!include( ../examples.pri ) { error( "Couldn't find the examples.pri file!" ) }
QT += 3dcore 3drender 3dinput 3dquick 3dlogic qml quick 3dquickextras
SOURCES += \ main.cpp
OTHER_FILES += \ main.qml
RESOURCES += \ simple-qml.qrc
